alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 8:46AM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River Near Bloomington affecting Refugio, Victoria and Calhoun Counties. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River Near Bloomington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. Flow downstream near Highway 35 is several hundred yards wide, cutting off many of the lowest homes. Livestock are cut off and could drown. Pumps, tank batteries, and any equipment in the flood plain below Victoria are flooded. The campground near Tivoli below Highway 35 and residences just above Highway 35 are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 23.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 26.9 feet Tuesday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (10 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Guadalupe River Bloomington 20.0 23.3 Sat 8 am 25.8 26.8 26.8 26.9 26.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
